content: ragdoll cat ornament crochet pattern this pattern is available for free on my blog - www loopsandlovecrochet com here you are paying to purchase an ad-free printable version of this crochet pattern this crochet ragdoll cat measures approximately 5 inches tall and is really fun to work up you ll find the pattern beginner friendly but also great for advanced crocheters too materials needed worsted weight yarn #4 weight cotton or acrylic yarn will work for this project you ll need 65-85yds in a main color and a small amount of the accent colors for the scarf and face 3 5 mm crochet hook a small amount of fiber stuffing to fill your cat yarn needle for weaving in ends and sewing on cat features **you may make and sell any items made from this pattern but please link back to this pattern or loops & love crochet please do not share reproduce or copy this pattern for any purpose please do not re-publish photos as your own thank you for respecting my rights as the designer and for supporting loops & love crochet thank you and happy crocheting loops & love crochet
